title: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, there is no busy cursor shown.
EB: It takes a long time (30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
SR: To reproduce this issue:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Navigate to the export Zip feature.3. Select all projects.4. Choose the desired file types.5. Press the 'OK' button.
